text: allahaninda granthavannu, adhikaravannu mattu dutasthanavannu padediruva yava manusyanu janarodane ‘‘nivu allahanannu bittu nanna dasaragiri’’ endu khandita helalaranu. Avanantu ‘‘divya granthavannu (itararige) kalisuttiruva mattu svatah adannu oduttiruva nivu devara nisthavanta dasaragiri’’ ende heluvanu
